turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I want to order a drink from Starbucks on Broadway Street in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get a grande caramel macchiato with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande caramel macchiato with whole milk to be picked up at the starbucks on broadway street in new york, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.
